summary: Two friends who witnessed an organized crime murder are threatened by the local mob into keeping quiet.
cast: Yûjirô Ishihara|Mie Kitahara|Akira Kobayashi|Mari Shiraki|Shôji Yasui|Jô Shishido|Naoki Sugiura|Masao Shimizu|Kaoru Kusuda|Toshio Takahara|Nobuo Kawakami|Keiko Amaji|Kyosuke Aihara|Saburô Hiromatsu|Shirô Yanase|Zenji Yamada|Sanpei Mine|Akiyoshi Fukae|Tomio Aoki|Noriko Watari|Gô Kuroda|Seijirô Takano|Ryûsei Itô|Ikunosuke Koizumi|Kyôichi Mizuki|Ken Misugi|Ichiro Kijima|Kazuo Kinugasa|Toshihiko Miyagawa|Sarao Ôsuga|Masayuki Kawamura|Makiko Tsunoda
title: Sabita naifu
